trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all strongly typed collections that manage <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe base per tutte le raccolte fortemente tipizzate che gestiscono <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The StateManagedCollection class is the base class for all strongly typed collections that store <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> elements, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>, and others.
trans-unit.target: La classe StateManagedCollection è la classe base per tutte le raccolte fortemente tipizzate che archiviano <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>elementi, tra cui <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>e altri utenti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The StateManagedCollection collection manages its own state as well as the state of the elements it contains.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta StateManagedCollection gestisce il proprio stato, nonché lo stato di elementi in che esso contenuti.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> saves the state of the collection and the state of all the elements currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, una chiamata a <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>Salva lo stato della raccolta e lo stato di tutti gli elementi attualmente contenuti nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most important methods to consider when deriving from the StateManagedCollection class are <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I metodi più importanti da considerare quando si deriva dalla classe StateManagedCollection sono <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> methods are used to store an index in view state for the type of a contained element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>metodi vengono utilizzati per archiviare un indice nello stato di visualizzazione per il tipo di un elemento contenuto.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Storing an index rather than a fully qualified type name improves performance.
trans-unit.target: L'archiviazione di un indice anziché un nome completo del tipo migliora le prestazioni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called whenever elements of the collection are manipulated, and validates the elements according to business rules.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato ogni volta che vengono modificati gli elementi della raccolta e gli elementi in base alle regole di business di convalida.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Currently, the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method prohibits `null` objects from being stored in the collection; however, you can override this method to define your own validation behavior in a derived type.
trans-unit.target: Attualmente, l'implementazione del <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo impedisce `null` oggetti vengano archiviate nella raccolta; tuttavia, è possibile eseguire l'override di questo metodo per definire il comportamento di convalida in un tipo derivato.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A> method forces the entire collection to be serialized to view state, rather than just serializing changes made to state since the last time it was loaded.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>metodo forza l'intera raccolta da serializzare allo stato di visualizzazione, anziché serializzare solo le modifiche apportate allo stato dall'ultima volta che è stato caricato.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A> method is an abstract method you can implement to perform this same behavior at the element level.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>metodo è un metodo astratto, è possibile implementare per eseguire lo stesso comportamento a livello di elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > StateManagedCollection stores assembly-qualified type names of the collection items in view state.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > StateManagedCollection archivia i nomi di tipo qualificato dall'assembly degli elementi della raccolta nello stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: A site visitor could decode the view state and retrieve the type name.
trans-unit.target: Visitatori del sito è stato possibile decodificare lo stato di visualizzazione e recuperare il nome del tipo.

trans-unit.source: If this scenario creates a security concern in your Web site, you can manually encrypt the type name before placing it in the view state.
trans-unit.target: Se questo scenario viene creato un problema di sicurezza del sito Web, è possibile crittografare il nome del tipo manualmente prima di inserirli nello stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override the constructor to provide customized implementation.
trans-unit.target: Le classi derivate possono eseguire l'override del costruttore per fornire l'implementazione personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli elementi dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A> method is called before the Clear method is called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> method is called after Clear has finished removing elements from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>metodo viene chiamato prima di chiamare il metodo Clear e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo Clear ha completato la rimozione di elementi dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi del <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme in una matrice, iniziando in corrispondenza dell'indice matrice specifico.

trans-unit.source: The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: La matrice specificata deve essere di un tipo compatibile.

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi vengono copiati il <xref:System.Array>nello stesso ordine in cui l'enumeratore scorre la <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Array>deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di elementi contenuti nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi contenuti nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of a class that implements <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, crea un'istanza di una classe che implementa <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of object created is based on the specified member of the collection returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di oggetto creato è basato sul membro specificato della raccolta restituita dal <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>

trans-unit.source: The CreateKnownType method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di CreateKnownType viene chiamato internamente dal <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>raccolta nella sua implementazione del <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: Derived collections override the CreateKnownType method to return a default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> type identified by the provided `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate di eseguire l'override del metodo CreateKnownType per restituire un'istanza predefinita del <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>tipo identificato dal forniti `index`, che esegue il mapping a uno dei tipi restituiti per il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The index, from the ordered list of types returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>, of the type of <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: L'indice, dall'elenco ordinato di tipi restituiti dal <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>, del tipo di <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> da creare.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class derived from , according to the index provided.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di una classe derivata da , in base al index fornito.

trans-unit.source: In all cases when not overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: In tutti i casi quando non viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un iteratore che scorre la <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>che può essere utilizzato per scorrere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> types that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> tipi di <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> raccolta può contenere.

trans-unit.source: The GetKnownTypes method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di GetKnownTypes viene chiamato internamente dal <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>raccolta nella sua implementazione del <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: Derived collections override the GetKnownTypes method to return an array of <xref:System.Type> objects that represent the types the collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate di eseguire l'override del metodo GetKnownTypes per restituire una matrice di <xref:System.Type>gli oggetti che rappresentano i tipi di raccolta può contenere.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An ordered array of <xref:System.Type> objects that identify the types of <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> objects the collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: Matrice ordinata di <xref:System.Type>gli oggetti che identificano i tipi di <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> gli oggetti della raccolta può contenere.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*> method removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, esegue ulteriori operazioni prima che il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>metodo rimuove tutti gli elementi dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnClear method to perform any additional work before all items are removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>possono eseguire l'override del metodo OnClear per eseguire ulteriori operazioni prima che vengano rimossi tutti gli elementi della raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work after the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*> method finishes removing all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, esegue ulteriori operazioni dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>metodo ha completato la rimozione di tutti gli elementi dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnClearComplete method to perform any additional work after all items are removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>possono eseguire l'override del metodo OnClearComplete per eseguire ulteriori operazioni dopo la rimozione di tutti gli elementi della raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> method adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, esegue ulteriori operazioni prima che il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> metodo aggiunge un elemento alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnInsert method to perform any additional work before an item is added to the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>possono eseguire l'override del metodo OnInsert per eseguire ulteriori operazioni prima dell'aggiunta di un elemento nella raccolta usando il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale `value` deve essere inserito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da inserire nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work after the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> method adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, esegue ulteriori operazioni dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> metodo aggiunge un elemento alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnInsertComplete method to perform any additional work after an item is added to the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>possono eseguire l'override del metodo OnInsertComplete per eseguire ulteriori operazioni dopo l'aggiunta di un elemento nella raccolta usando il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` is inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale `value` viene inserito tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The object inserted into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto viene inserito il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method removes the specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, esegue ulteriori operazioni prima che il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> metodo rimuove l'elemento specificato dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnRemove method to perform any additional work before an item is removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>possono eseguire l'override del metodo OnRemove per eseguire ulteriori operazioni prima di un elemento viene rimosso dalla raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero dell'elemento da rimuovere, che viene utilizzato quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da rimuovere dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>, che viene utilizzato quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work after the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method removes the specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, esegue ulteriori operazioni dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> metodo rimuove l'elemento specificato dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnRemoveComplete method to perform any additional work after an item is removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Raccolte derivate da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>possono eseguire l'override del metodo OnRemoveComplete per eseguire ulteriori operazioni dopo la rimozione di un elemento della raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero dell'elemento da rimuovere, che viene utilizzato quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: The object removed from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto rimosso dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>, che viene utilizzato quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates an element of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, convalida un elemento del <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The OnValidate method is called to validate the object manipulated through the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface methods.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnValidate viene chiamato per convalidare l'oggetto modificato tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>implementazione del <xref:System.Collections.IList>metodi di interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is to verify that the object manipulated by the collection is not `null`; however, collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> override the OnValidate method to perform any additional validation, such as type-checking.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita consiste nel verificare che l'oggetto modificato tramite la raccolta non è `null`; tuttavia, raccolte derivate da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>eseguire l'override del metodo OnValidate per eseguire un'ulteriore convalida, ad esempio il controllo del tipo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> da convalidare.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Forces the entire <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection to be serialized into view state.
trans-unit.target: Forza l'intero <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> raccolta da serializzare in stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The SetDirty method forces the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection to be serialized completely (whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method saves only the change information).
trans-unit.target: Il metodo impone SetDirty il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>raccolta deve essere serializzato completamente (mentre il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>metodo salva solo le informazioni sulle modifiche).</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when a collection has changed in a significant way and change information is insufficient to recreate the object in memory from view state.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile quando una raccolta è stata modificata in modo significativo e informazioni sulle modifiche è sufficiente per ricreare l'oggetto in memoria dallo stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, instructs an <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> contained by the collection to record its entire state to view state, rather than recording only change information.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, indica un <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> incluso nella raccolta di registrare l'intero stato di visualizzazione, invece di registrare solo modificare le informazioni.

trans-unit.source: The SetDirtyObject method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetDirtyObject viene chiamato internamente dal <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> that should serialize itself completely.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> che deve essere serializzato completamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di elementi contenuti nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi di <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> raccolta è sincronizzata (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un iteratore che scorre la <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>che può essere utilizzato per scorrere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un elemento per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsert%2A> methods are called before the element is added to the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> method is called after the element is added.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsert%2A>metodi vengono chiamati prima l'elemento viene aggiunto alla raccolta e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo l'elemento viene aggiunto.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The<xref uid="langword_csharp_ object " name=" object " href=""></xref>to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The<xref uid="langword_csharp_ object " name=" object " href=""></xref>to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: La posizione in cui è stato inserito il nuovo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli elementi dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method is called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> method is called after <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> has finished removing elements from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>metodo viene chiamato prima di <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>metodo viene chiamato e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>ha completato la rimozione di elementi dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> raccolta contiene un valore specifico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the collection is checked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare `value` prima che venga selezionata la raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> per individuare il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is found in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto viene trovato nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed for the value parameter, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> viene passato per il parametro di valore, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specified item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina l'indice di un elemento specificato nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare `value` prima che venga restituito l'indice.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da individuare nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of value, if it is found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di value , se è presente nell'elenco; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un elemento nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `index` is -1, `value` is appended to the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è -1, `value` viene aggiunto all'inizio del <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, `value` is appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è uguale al numero di elementi nella raccolta, `value` viene aggiunto alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale `value` deve essere inserito.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da inserire nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Specificato index non compreso nell'intervallo della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> raccolta ha dimensioni fisse.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Specificato index non compreso nell'intervallo della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato da di <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the value is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare `value` prima che il valore viene rimosso dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the object is removed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>metodo viene chiamato prima che l'oggetto viene rimosso e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo la rimozione dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da rimuovere dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the value is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare `value` prima che il valore viene rimosso dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the object is removed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>metodo viene chiamato prima che l'oggetto viene rimosso e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo la rimozione dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme Salva le modifiche apportate allo stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is marked to save its own state and the state of all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> items it contains; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta è contrassegnata per salvare il proprio stato e dello stato di tutti i <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> elementi in esso contenuti; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> items it contains.
trans-unit.target: Ripristina lo stato di visualizzazione salvato in precedenza il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme e <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> elementi in esso contenuti.

trans-unit.source: This method restores view-state information that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ripristina le informazioni sullo stato di visualizzazione salvato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di visualizzazione è costituito da tutti i valori delle proprietà di un controllo server.

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: Questi valori vengono inseriti automaticamente nel <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>proprietà, ovvero un'istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>classe. server la</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Valore di questa proprietà viene quindi inserito in un oggetto stringa dopo il salvataggio dello stato fase del ciclo di vita del controllo server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [NIB: i controlli Server Web ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene usato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: È possibile eseguire l'override di questo metodo per specificare come un controllo server personalizzato ripristina lo stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sulla gestione dello stato di ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the collection and collection elements' state to restore.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta la raccolta e ripristinare lo stato degli elementi della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection and each <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> object it contains since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Salva le modifiche per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme e ogni <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> oggetto dal momento che contiene la pagina è stato registrato nel server.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene usato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli.

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di visualizzazione è costituito da tutti i valori delle proprietà di un controllo server.

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: Questi valori vengono inseriti automaticamente nel <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>proprietà, ovvero un'istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>classe. server la</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Valore di questa proprietà viene quindi inserito in un oggetto stringa dopo il salvataggio dello stato fase del ciclo di vita del controllo server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [NIB: i controlli Server Web ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML hidden element (`<input type="hidden">`).
trans-unit.target: Quando viene salvato lo stato di visualizzazione, l'oggetto stringa viene restituito al client come una variabile che viene archiviata in un elemento HTML nascosto (`<input type="hidden">`).

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando si creano controlli server personalizzati, è possibile migliorare l'efficienza eseguendo l'override di questo metodo e la modifica del controllo server <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) and[ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [NIB: i controlli Server Web ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) e[Cenni preliminari sulla gestione dello stato di ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> and the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto che contiene le modifiche per lo stato di visualizzazione di <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> e gli elementi che contiene.

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the collection and its elements, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se non lo stato di visualizzazione è associato la raccolta e i relativi elementi, questo metodo restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection and each of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> objects it contains to track changes to their view state so they can be persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Determina il <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> insieme e ogni il <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> in esso contenuto per rilevare le modifiche allo stato di visualizzazione in modo può essere reso persistente in tutte le richieste della stessa pagina.
